title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 606.12 - Special meetings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 606.12 - Special meetings

State Regulations

Special meetings of the council may be called by the
(co)president(s) at the (co)president(s)' discretion. Also, meetings shall be
called by the (co)president(s) upon the written request of a majority of the
executive committee or at least one fourth of the members of the council. The
(co)president(s) shall designate the times and places of such special meetings, which shall be held as early as possible. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
606.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
